casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America, Appellant, v. HARTFORD ACCIDENT & INDEMNITY COMPANY, Appellee. No. 14929. United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Feb. 11, 1955. David O. Walter, Ellis N. Slack, Fred E. Youngman, Sp. Assts. to Atty. Gen., D. of J., H. Brian Holland, Asst. Atty. Gen., D. of J., Washington, D. C., Chester L. Sumners, U. S. Atty., Oxford, Miss., for appellant. John S. Porter, Memphis, Tenn., Burch, Porter & Johnson, Memphis, Tenn., for appellee.

Before HOLMES, RIVES, and TUT-TLE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment appealed from is affirmed.
